dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Sovico Group is really making moves in Kazakhstan, you know, after they just bought Qazaq Air.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Sovico Group is really making moves in Kazakhstan, you know, after they just bought Qazaq Air.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Vietnamese conglomerate Sovico Group, which recently acquired Qazaq Air, is considering purchasing one of Kazakhstan's airports, according to Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of National Economy Serik Zhumangarin.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and now they're uh, considering buying one of the airports there. It makes sense for an airline to have its own base.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and now they're uh, considering buying one of the airports there. It makes sense for an airline to have its own base.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In addition, they are also considering purchasing and managing an airport, as an airline needs a base airport.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. Deputy Prime Minister Zhumangarin mentioned that on the sidelines of the Vietnamese leader's visit.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. Deputy Prime Minister Zhumangarin mentioned that on the sidelines of the Vietnamese leader's visit.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The potential deal was revealed on the sidelines of Vietnamese Communist Party General Secretary To Lam's state visit to Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right, To Lam was at the Akorda presidential residence meeting with President Tokayev. That's a pretty high-level connection.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, To Lam was at the Akorda presidential residence meeting with President Tokayev. That's a pretty high-level connection.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: To Lam held talks with President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev at the Akorda presidential residence.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And the trade between the two countries is already strongâ€”nearly a billion dollars last year.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the trade between the two countries is already strong-nearly a billion dollars last year.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In 2023, trade turnover between the two countries reached nearly $1 billion.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, Kazakhstan exports zinc and lead, and imports Vietnamese household appliances. They're really advanced in that area.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, Kazakhstan exports zinc and lead, and imports Vietnamese household appliances. They're really advanced in that area.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kazakhstan exports zinc and lead to Vietnam, and imports household appliances.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Zhumangarin said he was impressed by Vietnam's industrial zones, with Japanese and Korean companies operating there too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Zhumangarin said he was impressed by Vietnam's industrial zones, with Japanese and Korean companies operating there too.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: During the President's recent visit to Vietnam, we visited industrial zones, and we were very impressed. Japanese and South Korean companies are operating there and have set up local production.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It sounds like there's a lot of potential for growth in this partnership. Sovico Group seems like a major player.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It sounds like there's a lot of potential for growth in this partnership. Sovico Group seems like a major player.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. And expanding Qazaq Air along with acquiring an airport? That's a big commitment.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. And expanding Qazaq Air along with acquiring an airport? That's a big commitment.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The airline will also be expanded, Zhumangarin said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: I wonder which airport they're looking at though. He didn't specify, did he?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I wonder which airport they're looking at though. He didn't specify, did he?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: He did not specify which airport is under consideration for purchase.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: No, but it'll be interesting to see how this develops. Southeast Asia and Central Asia linking up like this.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, but it'll be interesting to see how this develops. Southeast Asia and Central Asia linking up like this.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. And with trade already at that level, it feels like this is just the beginning.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. And with trade already at that level, it feels like this is just the beginning.
